generated_text:
- road: The image shows a multi-lane road with white lane markings and arrows, which is the primary surface for vehicle travel.
- sidewalk: A paved area alongside the road with pedestrians, bordered by curbs and buildings, indicating it is designated for pedestrians.
- building: Multiple multi-story structures with windows and commercial signs line both sides of the street.
- vegetation: Several trees are visible along the street, particularly on the left side and in the background.
- sky: A gray, overcast sky is visible above the buildings and cranes.
- person: Two men are standing on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- car: Several cars are visible on the road, including a silver sedan directly ahead and a black SUV further ahead.
- truck: A white van and a white truck are parked on the left side of the street.
- traffic light: A red traffic light is visible in the distance at the intersection.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible on poles along the street, including directional and regulatory signs.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- wall: A section of a stone wall is visible on the right side of the sidewalk, adjacent to the building.
